titles.title: 129 It Was Alone The Savior Prayed

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It was alone the Savior prayed
In dark Gethsemane
Alone He drained the bitter cup
And suffered there for me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Alone - Alone
He bore it all alone
He gave Himself to save His own
He suffered bled and died
Alone - Alone

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It was alone the Savior stood
In Pilate's judgment hall
Alone the crown of thorns He wore
Forsaken thus by all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Alone upon the cross He hung
That others He might save
Forsaken then by God and man
Alone his life He gave
